thread.section_title: Heard on the Street - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The Banks Missing Out on the Stock-Trading Boom

author: Paul J. Davies
title: The Banks Missing Out on the Stock-Trading Boom
text:
Good old equities trading put a rocket under U.S. investment banks results in the first quarter. That begs a question whether European banks will benefit too.
Investors in banks like Barclays, Credit Suisse and Deutsche Bank, which all report results next week, shouldnâ€™t get over excited. European banks might not enjoy quite the same bounce: for some, equities were never their strong point, while others have been losing market share anyway.
...
